technique_name: 前扫腿 Qian Sao Tui (Front Sweep)
deduction_content: 支持腿大腿高于水平 - The thigh of supporting leg is above horizontal level
扫转腿脚掌在扫转时触地后离地 - The sole of sweeping foot leaves the ground after making contact for the sweeping action
扫转腿弯曲45°或超过45° - Sweeping leg bent 45° or more

questions.question: What is the error code for Qian Sao Tui (Front Sweep)?
What deduction occurs if the supporting leg's thigh is above horizontal level?
questions.answer: A deduction is applied when the thigh of supporting leg is above horizontal level.

questions.question: How much bend in the sweeping leg results in a deduction?
questions.answer: A deduction is applied when the sweeping leg is bent 45° or more.

questions.question: What is the proper foot position during the sweep?
questions.answer: The sole of the sweeping foot should maintain contact with the ground throughout the sweeping action without leaving the ground after making contact.
